Package GUI

Class ControllerBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.CellSocietyPane
      • GUI.CellSocietyGridPane
        • GUI.ControllerBox
  • public class ControllerBox
extends CellSocietyGridPane
    Author:
    riley The controller box is responsible for holding all of the controls the user interacts with. It depends on the cell society grid pane class, as well as certain resource files. It assumes that the correct ressource file exists use it as a part of the main window.
